titleStmt.title: Monumenta sepulchraria Sancti Pauli The monuments, inscriptions, and epitaphs, of kings, nobles, bishops, and others, buried in the Cathedrall Church of St. Paul, London. Untill this present yeere of Grace, 1614. Together, with the foundation of the Church: and a catalogue of all the bishops of London, from the beginning vntill this present. Neuer before, now with authoritie, published. By H.H.
titleStmt.author: Holland, Henry, 1583-1650?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for Matthew Law and H. Holland,

notesStmt.note: Identification of Eliot's Court Press and publication date from STC.
